authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource

options.name: Ticket
options.description: Tickets are the means through which your end users (customers) communicate with agents in Zendesk Support

options.description: Manage system and custom ticket fields

options.description: Manage users

options.name: Organization
options.description: Manage organizations

options.description: Get data related to the organization

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: details
options.description: Details about the organization, such as the address

options.name: domain_names
options.description: Comma-separated domain names associated with this organization

options.name: organizationFieldsUi
options.description: Values of custom fields in the organization's profile

values.name: field
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: tags
options.description: IDs of tags applied to this organization. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFieldsJson.description: Object of values to set as described here

returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
group
options.description: The group to search. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: query
options.description: Query syntax to search tickets

options.name: sortBy
options.description: Defaults to sorting by relevance

options.name: status
options.description: The state of the ticket

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

filters.name: filters
filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'ticket' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'description'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'update' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'update' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation IN ["get", "delete", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'ticketType'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'get' AND ticketType == 'regular' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'get' AND ticketType == 'suspended' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /ticketType == 'regular' THEN SHOW parameter 'group'
IF /ticketType == 'regular' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF /ticketType == 'regular' THEN SHOW parameter 'status'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'delete' AND ticketType == 'regular' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'delete' AND ticketType == 'suspended' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'recover' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'ticketField' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'ticketField' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'ticketFieldId'
IF resource == 'ticketField' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'ticketField' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'search' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getRelatedData' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getOrganizations' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'getRelatedData' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
